info.en:
Service configuration
Location of nodes
Eastern EU and Ukraine
Configuration of Servers
May change later：
RAM：1-4 TB 
CPU core：32+（but will need a one core in the news conference）
SSD :20 TB + 
Nodes：2 + 2 standby
Group Introduction
EOSGreen is one of the Block Producers, BPs, on EOS blockchain. As our title describes EOSGreen aims at using sustainable solutions to run it’s activities and also drive sustainability in EOS ecosystem. We at EOSGreen would like to be the pioneers in driving the sustainability initiative in EOS Block Production.
We took a commitment to work together with the community in a sustainable direction and that will be our priority. We encourage solutions, ideas & dApps which standby our core mission values. We are already in discussion with potential projects. 
Find us on
GitHub
https://github.com/eosgreen
Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/eosgreen.io
Steemit
https://steemit.com/@marcinsteem
info.zh_CN:
节点位置
Eastern EU and Ukraine
服务器配置
下面列出的硬件规格可能会根据Block.One和社区推荐进行更改：
RAM：1-4 TB 
CPU内核：32+（但是在发布时需要一个1核CPU）
存储磁盘空间20 TB + 
节点：2 + 2待机
团队介绍
EOS Green是一家受区块链技术和可再生能源相结合启发的公司。
我们提供适当的设备以参与EOS块的生产，所有需要的能源最终将来自太阳能电池板，水电和生物燃料等可再生资源。未来，我们计划不仅为我们而且为成千上万的潜在客户产生和储存足够的能量。预计未来十年内，美国国家可再生能源市场将继续强劲增长，这将为我们实现成功的商业做出承诺。我们所做的一切，我们都相信挑战我们如何使用该技术的现状。
联系方式
